BIO

Andrew is a full stack JavaScript developer working on e-commerce and blockchain projects. After building and running different businesses for over a decade, Andrew found his passion in developing and managing software products.

shvchk

JavaScript Developer

Web & Mobile Apps Development. Working on various projects with different complexity. Using stack technologies: Javascript / ESMASCript 6, MongoDB, Node.js, REST API. Designed and developed application for creating business proposals. Designed and developed e-commerce used cars sales website.

Full lifecycle project managment of an internal software system. Requirements analysis, specification and management. Overseeing Software Requirements Specification documentation.
